newsitem.title: UK: Japanese stocks in London steady ahead of holidays.
newsitem.headline: Japanese stocks in London steady ahead of holidays.

text.p: Japanese shares were little changed in quiet trade on Friday with many participants away due to the long holiday weekend in both Britain and the U.S., dealers said.
"There isn't a lot going on today. The tone is basically steady but with both London and New York closed on Monday, people aren't too keen to do much," one dealer said.
London financial markets are closed on Monday, May 26 for a Spring Bank holiday while the U.S. is shut for the annual Memorial Day celebrations.
Sony Corp was trading at 9,655 yen after rising 280 yen in Tokyo to close at 9,680 yen.
